recipesJson.name: Blood Orange Sherbet | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This profile has distinct orange notes with a creamy, yet slightly icy, base.  Give it a go! It's a great recipes to hail the end of Summer.  See the full Episode and flavor notes at https://youtu.be/oSlBtoAwknw .

This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, and Folkart.
Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every other Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

![Legacy](https://imgur.com/LA0lhIG.png)

reviews.text:
I must say that off the shake it's pretty good! I'm not a huge orange fan but this one is easy to vape. A tiny bit throaty but it's ok. 5 star cause it's good and you guys are awesome üòã 
Edit: the harshness disappeared after 24 hour and the first 2 days the flavor was pretty good....try it again today after 8 days and the flavor has completely changed, I must say that I'm not able to vape it after a week, to me it's kinda dry and there's a wired taste that I cannot put my finger on, but I don't like it.....still 5 star for a 48 hour mix, I'm going to mix it again, like 10 or 15 ml and vape it right away.....

This is delicious!! I've never really vaped anything this distinctly ORANGE before, so I was pleasantly surprised. It's super bright & punchy & 100% accurate to the profile. I'm still pretty new to mixing, so I was blown away by just how flavorful an 8.5% total flavoring recipe could be. The Developed guys definitely don't disappoint with this one!! üçäü§§
